DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare neonatal outcome infant neurologic outcome whose mother treat cefazolin plus clarithromycin one week delivery preterm premature rupture membrane .
DOC.brief_title: Duration Antibiotics Treatment With Cefazolin Clarithromycin Women With Preterm Premature Rupture Membrane
DOC.criteria: preterm premature rupture membrane ( PPROM ) , PA 22+0~34+0wks ROM < 72 hrs randomization cervical dilatation < 3cm uterine contraction le 4 time per 1 hr Major fetal malformation Rupture membrane > 72hrs randomization Vaginal bleeding IIOC ( incompetent internal o cervix ) Placenta previa Gestational diabetes overt diabetes Hypertensive disorder pregnancy Liver cirrhosis Acute renal failure
